name: RUSH (itch) (GL1TCH3D)
description:
Overview:

Immerse yourself in the wave based sci-fi shooter destroying anything that comes in your path. Defeat the hoard of robots before they get the chance to kill you.

Features:

  • Waves
  • Interactive terrain
  • Intelligent AI

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D - Up, Left, Down, Right
  • Mouse - Look control
  • Left Click - Primary weapon
  • Escape - Pause

System Requirements:

  • Operating System: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 8 compatible Graphics Card
  • Hard Drive: 200 MB Hard Drive space

Contact:

For any issues or bugs, feel free to contact me

Email - janhopkins1994@hotmail.com
